welcome-intro: This page prepares a secure connection to your node. You can install the app or continue directly.
privacy-hint: Connection parameters are stored locally for this session and never shown.
unreachable-hint: The node is not reachable. Connect to the node's Wi‑Fi hotspot first, then retry.
hotspot-instruction: If you just installed the PWA, ensure your device is connected to the dedicated hotspot of your Casanode before pressing Connect.
